text: The XMLSerializer is repeating the default namespace declaration when descendents of an element are part of the same namespace. For example: is equivalent to Therefore, an "xmlns" attribute containing the default namespace URI should not be printed out by the XMLSerializer if it is the same and previously defined by an ancester of this element. The bug happens in startElement. The default namespace could probably be added to the ElementState class to fix the problem.
